com.facebook.buck.core.test.rule

Interface HasTestRunner


  • public interface HasTestRunner
    This marks a Description Arg for a test rule as having a test runner that knows how to run the test. The test runner is declared as a library.

    TODO(bobyf): need a slightly better api or a new rule as a library doesn't quite make sense.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<BuildTarget> getRunner() 
      Optional<TestRunnerSpec> getSpecs() 

    • Method Detail

      • getRunner

        Optional<BuildTarget> getRunner()
        Returns:
        the target to the library containing the test runner

      • getSpecs

        Optional<TestRunnerSpec> getSpecs()
        Returns:
        the freeform (for now) specs as required for running tests. For example, cmds, contacts, etc. This is serialized as json for for the external test runner.
